\part*{Approval Sheet}

In partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of Bachelor
of Science in Computer Engineering, this project entitled ``Improving
Data Center Network Performance through Path Diversity'', prepared
and submitted by Charles Joshua M. Alba, Kyle Dominic A. Gomez, and
Rene Josiah M. Quinto, is hereby recommended for approval.
